access_scores_ems:ems_cnt.long_name: Access to emergency medical services by count
access_scores_ems:ems_cnt.short_description: Count of emergency medical services facilities based on facility locations
access_scores_ems:ems_cnt.long_description: Count of emergency medical services facilities based on facility locations. Location data was collected from the Homeland Infrastructure Foundation-Level Data (HIFLD) repository.
access_scores_ems:ems_cnt.statement: There are {value} emergency medical services facilities in {features.name}.

access_scores_ems:ems_3sfca.long_name: Emergency medical services access score (3-step floating catchment areas)
access_scores_ems:ems_3sfca.short_description: Index of emergency medical services accessibility based on supply and demand of facilities
access_scores_ems:ems_3sfca.long_description: Emergency medical services access score based on 3-step floating catchment areas. This method is an aggregation of facilities per population ratios weighted by distance or travel time in each catchment area (area within which a facility is accessible). Weights are defined for the demand for facilities (adult population).
access_scores_ems:ems_3sfca.statement: The emergency medical services accessibility score for {features.name} is {value}.
